summary: The "Smart Cities and Communities Act of 2025" aims to promote the use of smart technologies to improve community livability, services, and resilience. It establishes an Interagency Council to coordinate federal efforts, provides grants for technology demonstrations, funds workforce training programs, and supports the development of standards and interoperability. The bill also includes provisions for international cooperation, a cybersecurity working group, and a trade program to enhance the global competitiveness of U.S. smart city technologies.
